transArray.content:
The first thing to praise is that takeout is not allowed upstairs, but their robot is still very convenient for delivering takeout.

When I first entered the toilet, I didn't know why the nozzle was on the floor. The sanitation is very clean. It is also a budget hotel. I personally feel that the price/performance ratio is very high.

Thank you very much for your affirmation and suggestions. The waiter is also very sorry for the inconvenience caused to you during your stay. We will actively adopt your suggestions. We hope that we can give you a different experience next time you stay. I wish you a pleasant journey.
